titleStmt.title: An end to discord wherein is demonstrated that no doctrinal controversy remains between the Presbyterian and Congregational ministers fit to justify longer divisions : with a true account of Socinianism as to the satisfaction of Christ / by Daniel Williams.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Daniel, 1643?-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Lawrence and Tho. Cockeril,
